}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{See also|Chromebook|Qualcomm}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Qualcomm]] SC7180 Octa-Core ARM (Cortex-A76) :4x ''Kryo'' 468 @2.1GHz, 4x ''Kryo'' 468 @1.9GHz *GPU: [[Qualcomm]] Adreno 618 @825 MHz :(OpenGL ES3.2, OpenCL 2.0, DX12) :(with 4K VP9 and 4K H265/H264 decoding) *Storage: 64GB (eMMC 5.1) Flash, *Memory: 4GB (LPDDR4) SDRAM *Wi-Fi: [[Qualcomm]] WCN3991 (2T2R) :802.11abgn/ac, BT 5.0 *USB: 1x USB 3.2 Gen 1 (Type-A) port :2x USB 3.2 Gen 1 (Type-C) ports *Power Source: 15V 3A or :Li-Ion battery (7.5V, 4659mAh, 35Wh)
==Links of Interest== *[https://www.zdnet.com/article/acer-launches-its-first-chromebook-with-qualcomms-snapdragon-7c-compute-platform/ ''Acer launches its first Chromebook with Qualcomm's Snapdragon 7c'' on '''ZDNET'''] *[https://www.engadget.com/acer-chromebook-spin-513-snapdragon-7c-140002893.html ''Acer's first Chromebooks with Snapdragon 7c'' on '''engadget''']
